column1: '''''Usvainen [[Rhûn]]''''' is a song by the epic metal band [[Battlelore]]. It appears in their third full-length album, [[Third Age of the Sun]].

column3:
>
Pinnan alla 
Varjoissa Rhûnin 
Pohjalla hiekassa 
Tumman veden huomassa 
Lepää voima sankaruuden 
Valossa 
Kajossa uuden aamun 
Usva väistyy 
Häipyy mailleen 
Piiloihinsa 
Miekka nousee syvyydestä 
On kolmas aika auringon
</poem>
===English===
<poem style=font-style:italic
column5:
>
Under the surface
In the shadows of Rhûn
At the bottom in the sand
In the midst of the dark sea
rests the strength of heroism
In the light
In the brightness of a new morning
Mist gives way
Flees to its territory
To its hiding places
The sword rises from the depths
It's the third age of the sun
</poem>
